text: David Bright (13 June 1956 â€“ 25 January 2021) was a Botswanan football manager. In 1992, Bright joined Mogoditshane Fighters in the Botswana First Division. He led the team to three Botswana Premier League titles between 1999 and 2001. Bright has also managed Engen Santos, Bay United, Gaborone United and Bay United. Bright died of COVID-19 during the COVID-19 pandemic in Botswana on 25 January 2021, aged 64. ==References== Category:1956 births Category:2021 deaths Category:Botswana sportspeople Category:Football managers Category:Deaths from the COVID-19 pandemic in Botswana
title: David Bright (football manager)
